Pipeline
public class TcpPipeline
extends AbstractPipeline

A pipeline which uses the TCP protocol and OIO.

Author:
Philip Diffenderfer

Constructor Detail

TcpPipeline

public TcpPipeline()
Instantiates a new TcpPipeline. This method of instantiating should only be done if the application has a single pipeline OR the pipelines are based off of different technologies (NIO, OIO). The other method is preferred, this method is to keep single pipeline development simpler.

TcpPipeline

public TcpPipeline(OioSelector selector)
Instantiates a TcpPipeline.

Parameters:
selector - The selector for the pipeline providing workers and acceptors.
Method Detail

newServer

public Server newServer()
Creates a new Server. If there is an error creating the server, null will be returned. The default ServerListener will be added to the server if non-null.

Returns:
The reference to the newly created server, or null.

newClient

public Client newClient(Server server)
Creates a new Client for a server implementation. If there is an error creating the client, null will be returned. The default ClientListener will be added to the client if non-null.

Parameters:
server - The server the client is for.
Returns:
The reference to the newly created client, or null.
